sentences.en: A detachment of ten men remained behind to guard the prisoners.
sentences.cn: 由十名士兵组成的分遣队留在后面看守囚犯.

sentences.en: Degradation is accelerated following leaf detachment.
He answered with an air of detachment.
sentences.cn: 他回答时带着冷漠的神态。
他表现得不偏不倚,超然事外.

sentences.en: He was unable to examine the issue with detachment.
sentences.cn: 他不能客观公正地调查这一问题.

sentences.en: His air of detachment lost him many friends.
sentences.cn: 他那种超然的态度使他失去了很多朋友.

sentences.en: I drove into Hanoi with strange detachment.
sentences.cn: 车子开进河内市区时,我有一种奇特的超脱感觉.

sentences.en: One detachment of the crowd had already poured on to the other end of the veranda.
sentences.cn: 群众的一队已经涌上了管理部另一端的游廊.

sentences.en: One detachment pushed into the eastern suburbs towards the airfield.
sentences.cn: 一支小分队开进了东部郊区向飞机场挺进。

sentences.en: Ridley viewed his work with a cynical detachment.
sentences.cn: 里德利以一种吹毛求疵的超然态度看待他的作品。

sentences.en: She did not care for the idea of socializing with her clients. It would detract from her professional detachment.
sentences.cn: 她不喜欢跟客户们有社交往来。这会影响她的职业客观性。

sentences.en: The advance detachment has engaged the enemy.
The detachment made a rapid march of 100 li in one night.
sentences.cn: 部队急行军,一夜走了一百里.

sentences.en: The detachment of cables from the computer will take an hour.
sentences.cn: 将电缆线从计算机上拆下来需要一小时.

sentences.en: The detachment set off ahead of schedule.
The upright orientation is also the first step in surface detachment for bacteria.
sentences.cn: 这种直立的方位也是细菌脱离组织表面的第一步。

sentences.en: We are the advance detachment. The main forces will be here soon.
sentences.cn: 我们是先头部队, 大军随后就到.

words.tran_cn: 可分开的；可拆开的；可分遣的
分离，拆开；超然；分遣；分遣队

phrases.tran_cn: 拆离断层；滑脱断层；脱顶断层；挤离断层

trans.tran_cn: 冷漠，冷静，公正，分遣队，拆卸
trans.tran_en: a group of soldiers who are sent away from a larger group to do a special job
